message.entry: Invalid input. The {0} argument expects a cell array of collision geometries.
Dimension mismatch. The value of any field in the vhacdOptions object must be either scalar or a vector with {0} elements, corresponding to the {0} links in the robot being imported.
Dimension mismatch. When the vhacdOptions object has Type="IndividualMesh", all properties of the options object must be scalar.
Dimension mismatch. When the vhacdOptions object has Type="RigidBodyTree", all properties of the options object must be either scalar or a vector of length matching the other properties.
